paragraphs.content: Thus saith the LORD; For three transgressions of Moab, and for four, I will not turn away the punishment thereof; because he burned the bones of the king of Edom into lime:
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thus saith the Lord; For three transgressions of Moab, and for four, I will not turn away the punishment thereof; because he burned the bones of the king of Edom into lime:

paragraphs.content: But I will send a fire upon Moab, and it shall devour the palaces of Kerioth: and Moab shall die with tumult, with shouting, and with the sound of the trumpet:
paragraphs.contentHtml: But I will send a fire upon Moab, and it shall devour the palaces of Kerioth: and Moab shall die with tumult, with shouting, and with the sound of the trumpet:

paragraphs.content: And I will cut off the judge from the midst thereof, and will slay all the princes thereof with him, saith the LORD.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And I will cut off the judge from the midst thereof, and will slay all the princes thereof with him, saith the Lord.

paragraphs.content: ¶ Thus saith the LORD; For three transgressions of Judah, and for four, I will not turn away the punishment thereof; because they have despised the law of the LORD, and have not kept his commandments, and their lies caused them to err, after the which their fathers have walked:
paragraphs.contentHtml: ¶ Thus saith the Lord; For three transgressions of Judah, and for four, I will not turn away the punishment thereof; because they have despised the law of the Lord, and have not kept his commandments, and their lies caused them to err, after the which their fathers have walked:

paragraphs.content: But I will send a fire upon Judah, and it shall devour the palaces of Jerusalem.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But I will send a fire upon Judah, and it shall devour the palaces of Jerusalem.

paragraphs.content: ¶ Thus saith the LORD; For three transgressions of Israel, and for four, I will not turn away the punishment thereof; because they sold the righteous for silver, and the poor for a pair of shoes;
paragraphs.contentHtml: ¶ Thus saith the Lord; For three transgressions of Israel, and for four, I will not turn away the punishment thereof; because they sold the righteous for silver, and the poor for a pair of shoes;

paragraphs.content: That pant after the dust of the earth on the head of the poor, and turn aside the way of the meek: and a man and his father will go in unto the same maid, to profane my holy name:
paragraphs.contentHtml: That pant after the dust of the earth on the head of the poor, and turn aside the way of the meek: and a man and his father will go in unto the same maid, to profane my holy name:

paragraphs.content: And they lay themselves down upon clothes laid to pledge by every altar, and they drink the wine of the condemned in the house of their god.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And they lay themselves down upon clothes laid to pledge by every altar, and they drink the wine of the condemned in the house of their god.

paragraphs.content: ¶ Yet destroyed I the Amorite before them, whose height was like the height of the cedars, and he was strong as the oaks; yet I destroyed his fruit from above, and his roots from beneath.
paragraphs.contentHtml: ¶ Yet destroyed I the Amorite before them, whose height was like the height of the cedars, and he was strong as the oaks; yet I destroyed his fruit from above, and his roots from beneath.

paragraphs.content: Also I brought you up from the land of Egypt, and led you forty years through the wilderness, to possess the land of the Amorite.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Also I brought you up from the land of Egypt, and led you forty years through the wilderness, to possess the land of the Amorite.

paragraphs.content: And I raised up of your sons for prophets, and of your young men for Nazarites. Is it not even thus, O ye children of Israel? saith the LORD.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And I raised up of your sons for prophets, and of your young men for Nazarites. Is it not even thus, O ye children of Israel? saith the Lord.

paragraphs.content: But ye gave the Nazarites wine to drink; and commanded the prophets, saying, Prophesy not.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But ye gave the Nazarites wine to drink; and commanded the prophets, saying, Prophesy not.

paragraphs.content: Behold, I am pressed under you, as a cart is pressed that is full of sheaves.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Behold, I am pressed under you, as a cart is pressed that is full of sheaves.

paragraphs.content: Therefore the flight shall perish from the swift, and the strong shall not strengthen his force, neither shall the mighty deliver himself:
paragraphs.contentHtml: Therefore the flight shall perish from the swift, and the strong shall not strengthen his force, neither shall the mighty deliver himself:

paragraphs.content: Neither shall he stand that handleth the bow; and he that is swift of foot shall not deliver himself: neither shall he that rideth the horse deliver himself.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Neither shall he stand that handleth the bow; and he that is swift of foot shall not deliver himself: neither shall he that rideth the horse deliver himself.

paragraphs.content: And he that is courageous among the mighty shall flee away naked in that day, saith the LORD.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And he that is courageous among the mighty shall flee away naked in that day, saith the Lord.
